welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Maidencreek, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and warm community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport handles all freight and cargo operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport handles all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Upper Bucks Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flights.
